seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 5 years of experience required, with additional 6 years of experience in Databricks mentioned in the description

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer, core focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT processes, and data platform design

leadership_expectation.evidence: Assist in designing data platform blueprint, collaborate with architects, performance tuning, and governance suggests technical leadership without direct people management
